name: Bubble Shooter Mania-Pop Blast
description:
▶ Shoot bubbles to match and pop colorful bubbles in this new bubble shooter game!

Play the #1 Classic Casual, but newest, Bubble Shooter game for FREE!
Bubble Shooter is a classic puzzle game with simple rules that players of all ages can enjoy!
Look at the pattern, match bubbles with same colors and become a master of shooter!
Get combos to charge up special boosters and super-charge your shots, blasting even more bubbles!
Challenge yourself to a fantastic game play! Try to collect as much Stars as possible!
A brainteaser for you! Do you think you have what it takes to clear all levels with PERFECT?
Bubble Shooter is an addictive puzzle game!
Bubble Shooter Mania is free! Download, relax, and enjoy!

▶ How to Play
• So Simple, So Fun
• Aim and match the bubbles you want to pop.
• Match 3 or more bubbles of same color & clear the board.
• Use powerful boosters & items to help you blast through levels.
• Use less shots to earn higher score and earn 3 stars.

▶ Features
• Beat levels more easily: 5 Special Boosters help you beat levels easily!: Bomb, guide, rainbow, lightning, and laser beam
• Less than 40MB for client downloads
• No worries even if you don't have WiFi. You can enjoy the game from anywehere, anytime.
• Unlimited play

▶ Note
•This game contains, banner, interstitial, and reward video ads. You can choose to remove it by purchasing to remove ads.
•You can enjoy the game for free, but you can also choose to purchase in-game currencies or ad removal within the app.

▶ Misc
• Privacy policy: https://www.ninetap.com/privacy_policy.html
• End User License Agreement: https://www.ninetap.com/terms_of_service.html
